name: Choo-Choo! Train Rides!
description:
• Have you ever dreamed about being a train driver?
  • Do you like killing mutants?
  • Are you a fan of arcade or story games?
If any of your answers to these questions is yes, then you will like this game!

Explore, loot, kill and avoid obstacles to survive!Features
  • Arcade mode
  • Story mode
  • Procedural generation
  • Dedicated leaderboards
  • Full controller support
